component.name: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart
component.summary: A kart racing mod based on the 3D Sonic the Hedgehog fangame Sonic Robo Blast 2

description.p: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart (usually shortened to SRB2Kart or SRB2K) is a kart racing game with Sonic-themed characters, items and race tracks. SRB2Kart features over 100 maps for two game modes: the main Race mode and a Battle mode where players fight each other using the items available in the game.
Commercial assets are required to run the game. Check the project's website for instructions.
